name: com.kadronk.polymorphicfields
description:
Adds the [Polymorphable] field attribute, which adds a button next to the property that allows you to choose its type (among the subtypes of its declaring type). Applies to array elements when used on an array/list. The field must have the [SerializeReference] attribute too.
Adds the PolymorphicList<T> class, a ReorderableList wrapper that allows easy addition of elements typed with a subtype of T. It is recommended to only use them in custom editors (and NOT in property drawers).
